Dear Ms Chan,

I am writing to give some advices(no s) about the 30-minute programme which is about a local Hong Kong sporting(sports will do) event. In my opinion,I have some constructive suggestions which
First of all, I strongly suggest that the programme should stress on the advantages of sports . In Hong Kong, there has been a problem which youths are only focusing on their studies in order to enhance the exam resultS. SADLY, they(dont lengthen your essay in this way) DO NOT ATTACH IMPORTANCE to their physical health. As a result, not only the youngsters cannot relieve(collocation) their stress and have a greatest healthy body. IT GOES WITHOUT SAYING THAT TAKING UP A SPORT IS OF CARDINAL IMPORTANCE AS IT CAN HELP
THEM TO STRIKE A BALANCE BETWEEN STUDIES AND HEALTH . So, if the programme can PROVIDE THE YOUNG WITH the information about THE benefits OF SPORTS such as LOSING WEIGHT[SUCH AS+NOUN],EASING THEIR STRESS. WHEN THEY KNOW HOW IMPORTANT IT IS ,THEY WILL DO more sports I. Therefore,the programme should PUT EMPHASIS ON the advantageS OF DOING EXERCISE.
